::Ramulus::

Ramulus shakes his head. "No, he's got Striker and Spears as hostages. I got 
a message from Striker, but it was too static to make out. I'm meeting with 
Prebon soon. I have a feeling its a trap, though, Spears didn't seem like she 
was herself. Besides, she's been implanted with the chip, and I'm not sure if 
Prebon removed it. There are some cloaking devices in the equipment room. A 
few of you could come along in case things get ugly."
